column1: English Sent: Most volcanoes and earthquakes in the world are located at plate margins
column2: but some do occur within the plates.

column1: Hindi Tansl: viSva ke aXikawara jvAlAmuKI evaM BUkaMpa saMBAvI kRewra
column2: pleta ke kinAroM para sWiwa hEM ; lekina kuCa pleta ke aMxara BI pAye jAwe hEM.

column1: Anu Translation:  aXikAMSa jvAlAmuKI Ora viSva meM BUkampa pleta hASiyoM para sWiwa hE paranwu kuCa isa pleta meM Gatiwa howe hEM
